name: Peach Boys: A Musicians' Story
description:
Peach Boys, The Weeaboo Beach Boys of the future, are here in their own visual novel/rpg hybrid! Join the Weeb-san brothers and their band as they try to make it in the competitive and deadly world of music!

game features:

  • 30 minutes-an hour of gameplay, mostly visual novel but there are rpg sections/aspects
  • Large cast of characters
  • Weeaboo Beach Boys Covers
  • A Strange and Vast Setting in the Years 3105-3107 on the water planet of Ouiwana
  • Some fights?
  • One sidequest
  • A Linear Story but Many Possible Options for High Replayability

"Musician's Stories" is a tabletop game I invented that is still under development, and yet the games for testing have born many memorable stories I hope I can tell in a variety of ways. This is technically Musicians' Stories #2. Thanks to those who have helped create this story and many more to come!

soundtrack: 

this took 7 and a half months to develop, which is the most I've put into a game by far. granted, most of it was working at a snails pace in agony lol. i hope all this work is worth it.
